item.title: 里卡多-豪斯曼谈赢得贸易战的必要条件
item.description: 里卡多-豪斯曼谈赢得贸易战的必要条件【原文：Ricardo Hausmann on What it Takes to Win a Trade War】

item.title: 据说腾讯正在研究以 150 亿美元收购游戏开发商 Nexon 的交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，腾讯控股有限公司正在研究收购 Nexon Co.【原文：Tencent Holdings Ltd. is studying a potential deal for Nexon Co., as the Chinese internet giant looks for ways to bolster its lucrative gaming operations, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 德意志银行首席执行官称交易员克服了本季度的 "艰难开局
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）首席执行官克里斯蒂安-苏宁（Christian Sewing）表示，德意志银行的固定收益和货币交易员克服了第二季度开局的波折，应该会取得比去年同期更好的业绩。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG’s fixed income and currency traders overcame a choppy start to the second quarter and should deliver a better result than a year earlier, according to Chief Executive Officer Christian Sewing.】

item.title: 欧洲央行维勒鲁瓦称未来利率决策无固定立场
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪表示，他对未来的利率走势没有固定的立场，决定将取决于数据。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau said he has no fixed position on future interest rate moves and that decisions will depend on data.】

item.title: 金融稳定委员会的结说：加密货币正接近系统性风险的 "临界点
item.description: 即将离任的金融稳定委员会主席克拉斯-克诺（Klaas Knot）表示，来自加密资产的风险可能很快会对金融体系构成严重威胁。【原文：Risk emanating from cryptoassets could soon become a serious threat to the financial system, according to outgoing Financial Stability Board Chair Klaas Knot.】

item.title: 特朗普关税导致英国对美商品出口创历史最大降幅
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统发动全球贸易战之后，英国 4 月份对美国的商品出口创下了自 1997 年有记录以来的最大降幅。【原文：Britain’s goods exports to the US fell in April by the largest amount for any month since records began in 1997 after President Donald Trump launched his global trade war.】

item.title: 医疗科技公司 Brainlab 宣布法兰克福 IPO 计划
item.description: 医疗技术公司 Brainlab AG 宣布了在法兰克福证券交易所首次公开募股的计划，成为今年寻求上市的最新一家德国公司。【原文：Medical technology company Brainlab AG announced plans for an initial public offering on the Frankfurt Stock Exchange, becoming the latest German company to seek a listing this year.】

item.title: 据称 Jio BlackRock 将聘请 Kohli 担任共同基金部门首席信息官
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Jio BlackRock Asset Management 新成立的共同基金部门已任命 Rishi Kohli 为首席投资官。【原文：The newly formed mutual-fund arm of Jio BlackRock Asset Management has appointed Rishi Kohli as its chief investment officer, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国 220 亿美元长债拍卖面临关键考验
item.description: 经过几周对美国长期债务需求的手忙脚乱之后，所有人都在关注周四的 30 年期国债拍卖，以重新解读不断飙升的赤字是否导致投资者回避这一期限的国债。【原文：After weeks of hand-wringing around demand for long-term US debt, all eyes are on Thursday’s 30-year Treasury auction for a fresh read on whether spiraling deficits are causing investors to shun the maturity.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚通胀率攀升至一年新高，列伊创历史新低
item.description: 在最近的政治危机中，罗马尼亚列伊跌至历史最低点，从而提高了商品和服务的成本。【原文：Romanian inflation accelerated in May after the leu’s decline to a record low during a recent political crisis boosted costs of goods and services.】

item.title: 由于关税和税收的影响，英国 4 月经济萎缩 0.3
item.description: 大幅增税和美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税政策引发了英国经济六个月来的首次月度萎缩，使人们对工党政府通过加快经济增长为其支出雄心提供资金的计划产生了怀疑。【原文：Sharp tax increases and US President Donald Trump’s tariffs triggered the UK’s first monthly contraction in six months, casting doubt over the Labour government’s plan to fund its spending ambitions with faster growth.】

item.title: 伊朗紧张局势加剧，以色列内塔尼亚胡避免提前大选
item.description: 周四早些时候，反对党试图解散议会，本雅明-内塔尼亚胡总理的政府幸免于难。【原文：Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s government survived an attempt by opposition parties to dissolve parliament early Thursday, as tensions spiked over Iran’s nuclear program.】

item.title: 蚂蚁金服将在香港和新加坡申请稳定币许可证
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，马云支持的蚂蚁金服集团公司的国际部门正计划在新加坡和香港申请稳定币许可证。【原文：Jack Ma-backed Ant Group Co.’s international unit is planning to apply for stablecoin licenses in Singapore and Hong Kong, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国 4 月经济萎缩超预期
印度央行关闭离岸货币工具，战略发生转变
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度央行已经缩减了去年为应对强势美元而使用的一项关键工具的使用规模，这反映出印度央行在新领导层的领导下干预策略发生了变化。【原文：India’s central bank has scaled back its use of a key tool it deployed last year to counter the strong dollar, according to people familiar with the matter, reflecting a change in the authority’s intervention strategy under its new leadership.】

item.title: 整个夏天都在等待美联储
item.description:
通胀仍在潜伏，在关税面前走得太远没什么意义。【原文：

Inflation is still lurking, and there’s little point getting out too far in front of tariffs.

】

item.title: 日本不会急于达成贸易协议，但欢迎在七国集团会议之前取得进展
item.description: 日本首相石破茂表示，他不会匆忙与美国达成有损国家利益的贸易协议，尽管他欢迎在与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普举行峰会之前取得的任何进展。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba said he won’t rush into a trade deal with the US that would hurt the nation’s interests, although he’d welcome any progress made before an expected summit with US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 澳大利亚监管机构称全球分化正在加速
item.description: 澳大利亚监管机构表示，最近的国际发展似乎正在加快全球分化的步伐，增加复杂性和波动性。【原文：Australian regulators say recent international developments appear to be accelerating the pace of global fragmentation, increasing complexity and volatility.】

item.title: 越南贸易特使会见耐克和沃尔玛，推动美国关税交易
item.description: 越南贸易部长会见了耐克公司（Nike Inc）和沃尔玛公司（Walmart Inc）的高管，这是越南针对美国企业发起的大规模魅力攻势的一部分，旨在在高风险的贸易谈判之前争取支持，以避免征收高额关税。【原文：Vietnam’s trade minister met with executives from Nike Inc and Walmart Inc as part of a major charm offensive targeting US businesses, aiming to rally support ahead of high-stakes trade negotiations to avoid steep tariffs.】

item.title: 空中客车公司预计到 2044 年全球飞机机队规模将翻一番，印度将首当其冲
item.description: 空中客车公司（Airbus SE）预测，受印度等市场快速增长的刺激，未来 20 年全球商用飞机机队规模将翻一番，达到近 50,000 架。【原文：Airbus SE predicted the global commercial aircraft fleet will double in size to almost 50,000 planes over the next 20 years, spurred by rapid growth in markets like India, where a rising middle class increasingly takes to air travel.】

item.title: 伦敦是否正在失去其作为全球科技中心的优势？
item.description:
Revolut和Wise等英国大型金融科技公司正在将重点—和上市—转移到美国。【原文：

Major UK fintech firms like Revolut and Wise are shifting their focus—and listings—to the US.

】

item.description:

item.description:
人们越来越关注价格可能受到的影响。【原文：

People are growing more concerned about the potential impact on prices.

】

item.title: 塞尔维亚将在长期暂停后恢复降息：决策指南
item.description: 随着通胀率接近央行的目标和经济增长放缓，塞尔维亚准备自 9 月份以来首次降低借贷成本。【原文：Serbia is poised to cut borrowing costs for the first time since September as inflation approaches the central bank’s target and economic growth slows.】

item.title: 中国廉价资金为杠杆债券交易注入活力
item.description: 中国通过压低融资成本来支持经济的努力正在增加银行的贷款，这表明银行可能会通过低价借贷来购买债券以获取利润。【原文：China’s efforts to support the economy by keeping funding costs low are increasing lending among banks, in a sign they may be borrowing cheaply to buy bonds for a profit.】

item.title: 据说随着路演的开始，JSW 水泥将在孟买首次公开募股
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，JSW 水泥有限公司已开始为其计划中的首次公开募股进行路演，最快可能于下月在孟买举行。【原文：JSW Cement Ltd. has kicked off a roadshow for its planned initial public offering that could take place in Mumbai as soon as next month, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国战斗机撞击巡逻机后日本提出投诉
item.description: 据日本防卫省称，周末一架中国战斗机尾随一架日本巡逻机，距离飞机最远达 45 米，东京已向北京提出投诉。【原文：Tokyo has complained to Beijing after a Chinese fighter jet tailed a Japanese patrol aircraft over the weekend, flying as close as 45 meters from the aircraft, according to Japan’s Defense Ministry.】

item.title: 我需要接触印度 "的情绪催热了大宗交易和首次公开募股计划
item.description: 在经历了几个月的沉闷之后，印度的股票销售市场正在升温，因为公司和股东们都在活跃的股市中套现。【原文：India’s market for share sales is warming up after a several dull months, as companies and shareholders cash in on a buoyant stock market.】

item.title: 外国投资者以创纪录的速度涌入韩国债券市场
item.description: 5 月份，外国投资者以创纪录的速度加快了购买韩国债券的步伐，这凸显出在总统大选前夕以及在将韩国债券纳入主要全球指数之前，投资者对该资产类别的需求日益增长。【原文：Foreign investors accelerated purchases of South Korean bonds at a record pace in May, highlighting growing appetite for the asset class in the run-up to the presidential election and ahead of the addition to a major global index.】

item.title: 东非财政部长在预算中面临财政困境
item.description: 东非各国财政部长将在周四公布支出计划，届时他们将走钢丝，债务膨胀、收入表现不佳和地缘政治都将给财政整顿计划带来挑战。【原文：East African finance ministers will be walking a tightrope when they reveal their spending plans on Thursday, with ballooning debt, underperforming revenue and geopolitics challenging planned fiscal consolidation.】
